name: putText
description: The putText operation provides the function of OpenCV putText, and allows you to put text into your pipeline image.

parameters.name: text
parameters.description: The text to put into image

parameters.name: org
parameters.description: The bottom-left corner of the text. If org.y is negative, it is relative to the image bottom. Default is [5,-6]

parameters.name: color
parameters.description: JSON array of BGR values between 0 and 255. Default is [0,255,0]
